item.title: Learning Rails Podcast and Screencast
item.dc:creator: mattwhite
item.description: Not content with project work, IdeaJam 1.4, TaskJam and preparing for two Lotusphere sessions, I’ve been spending a bit of “spare” time starting to play with...
item.content:encoded:
Not content with project work, IdeaJam 1.4, TaskJam and preparing for two Lotusphere sessions, I’ve been spending a bit of “spare” time starting to play with Ruby on Rails.

I’m a bit behind the times on this but it’s a great web development environment and strangely similar to Domino web development in a lot of ways. Even so it takes a while to grok the different coding styles required. I found a great podcast and screencast here. They walk you through creating some basic apps and are incredibly helpful. They are also free! Ain’t the internets great?
